Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-46901 affecting package subversion for versions less than 1.14.3-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-46901 affecting package subversion for versions less than 1.14.3-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package subversion is earlier than 1.14.3-2, affected by CVE-2024-46901
